title: Will a major U.S. airline file a lawsuit against a tech giant over a software-related outage by August 2024?
body: This question will resolve as YES if, by August 31, 2024, a major U.S. airline files a lawsuit against a prominent technology company over a software-related outage that resulted in significant flight cancellations. The lawsuit must be officially filed in a court of law and reported by at least two reputable news sources. A 'major U.S. airline' is defined as one of the top 5 airlines by passenger volume in the United States. A 'prominent technology company' refers to a Fortune 500 tech company that provides software or cloud services to the airline industry. The outage in question must have occurred prior to the lawsuit filing and resulted in at least 1,000 flight cancellations. If no such lawsuit is filed by the specified date, or if the conditions are not met, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will a major US airline file a lawsuit against a cybersecurity firm by August 2024?
body: This question will resolve as YES if, by August 31, 2024, a major US airline files a lawsuit against a cybersecurity firm in relation to a technology outage that caused flight cancellations. The lawsuit must be officially filed in a court of law and reported by at least two reputable news sources. A 'major US airline' is defined as one of the top 5 airlines by passenger volume in the United States. The cybersecurity firm must be a company primarily focused on providing cybersecurity services or software. If no such lawsuit is filed by the specified date, or if a lawsuit is filed but does not meet the criteria outlined above, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will a major tech company announce a settlement with a major airline over a tech outage by August 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if, by August 31, 2024, a major technology company publicly announces a settlement with a major airline regarding a technology outage that caused significant flight cancellations. The announcement must come from an official statement by the technology company and be reported by at least two reputable news sources. A 'major technology company' is defined as a company listed in the top 20 of the Fortune 500 technology sector. A 'major airline' is defined as one of the top 10 airlines by revenue globally. If no such announcement is made by the specified date, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will Delta Air Lines announce a new cybersecurity partnership by August 2024?
body: This question will resolve as YES if Delta Air Lines officially announces a new cybersecurity partnership by August 31, 2024. The partnership must be explicitly related to enhancing Delta's cybersecurity measures or preventing technology outages. The announcement must be made through Delta's official channels (such as a press release or official statement) and reported by at least two reputable news sources. A 'new' partnership refers to a collaboration with a company that Delta has not previously had a formal cybersecurity agreement with. If no such announcement is made by the specified date, or if Delta only renews or modifies an existing cybersecurity partnership, the question will resolve as NO.

title: Will a choreographed dance showcase from the 2024 Paris Olympics be performed at another major international event by August 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if the choreographed dance showcase created for the 2024 Paris Olympics is performed at another major international event by August 31, 2024. A major international event is defined as an event with participants from multiple countries and significant media coverage from at least three international news outlets. The performance must be substantially similar to the original showcase and officially recognized as the same production. If no such performance occurs by the specified date, or if the showcase is significantly altered, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will a prominent French-Algerian choreographer announce a new dance project by August 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if a prominent French-Algerian choreographer, known for creating large-scale dance performances, announces a new dance project by August 31, 2024. The announcement must come from an official statement by the choreographer or their representative, or be reported by at least two reputable news sources. The new project should be distinct from any ongoing or previously announced works. A 'new dance project' is defined as a choreographed performance, dance series, or dance-related initiative that has not been publicly disclosed before the announcement date. The project does not need to be completed by the resolution date, but its concept and the choreographer's involvement must be clearly stated in the announcement.

body: This question resolves as YES if a choreographer receives a major award for a dance showcase specifically created for or associated with the Olympics by August 31, 2024. A major award is defined as recognition from a well-known international arts, dance, or sports organization. The award must be directly related to the choreographer's work on the Olympic-related dance showcase. The showcase must have been officially associated with the Olympic Games. If no such award is given by the specified date, or if an award is given but does not meet these criteria, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will a major opera house announce an American director for a new Wagner production by August 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if, by August 31, 2024, a major opera house (such as the Metropolitan Opera, La Scala, or the Royal Opera House) announces that an American director will lead a new production of a Wagner opera cycle or a significant Wagner opera. The announcement must come from official sources of the opera house or be reported by at least two reputable news organizations. The production does not need to be staged within this timeframe; only the announcement is required for resolution. If no such announcement is made by the specified date, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will a prominent American director be announced to lead a major Wagner opera at the Metropolitan Opera by August 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if, by August 31, 2024, the Metropolitan Opera officially announces that an American director will lead a new production of a major Wagner opera. The announcement must be confirmed by at least two reputable news sources. A 'major Wagner opera' in this context refers to either the Ring Cycle or Tristan und Isolde. The director must be described as known for innovative or groundbreaking productions. The announcement should also mention a renowned soprano as part of the cast and indicate that the opera's music director will conduct the performance. If no such announcement is made by the specified date, or if the announced production does not meet all these criteria, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will a Democratic presidential candidate announce a running mate by August 31, 2024?
body: This question will resolve as YES if a Democratic presidential candidate officially announces a running mate for the 2024 U.S. presidential election by August 31, 2024. The announcement must be made by the candidate themselves or their official campaign, and it must be reported by at least two reputable national news sources (such as Associated Press, Reuters, New York Times, Washington Post, or CNN). The running mate must be explicitly designated as the vice-presidential candidate. If no such announcement is made by the specified date, or if the Democratic Party does not nominate a presidential candidate by this date, the question will resolve as NO.

title: Will France reduce its imports of Russian liquified natural gas by over 20% by August 2024?
body: This question will resolve as YES if, by August 31, 2024, it is confirmed that France has reduced its imports of Russian liquified natural gas by more than 20% compared to a previous comparable period. The reduction must be confirmed by official trade data or reports from at least two reputable news sources. The comparison period should be clearly stated in the confirming reports. If no such reduction is confirmed by the resolution date, or if France's imports of Russian LNG have increased or remained stable, the question will resolve as NO.

title: Will France announce a complete halt to importing Russian liquified natural gas by August 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if, by August 31, 2024, the French government officially announces a complete halt to importing Russian liquified natural gas (LNG). The announcement must come from an official government statement or be reported by at least two reputable international news sources. The announcement should explicitly state that France will cease all imports of Russian LNG, not just a reduction. If no such announcement is made by the specified date, or if France announces only a partial reduction in Russian LNG imports, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will the European Union impose new sanctions on Russian liquefied natural gas by August 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if, by August 31, 2024, the European Union officially imposes new sanctions specifically targeting Russian liquefied natural gas (LNG). The sanctions must be officially announced by the EU and reported by at least two reputable international news sources. The sanctions should be distinct from any existing measures and explicitly address the import, trade, or use of Russian LNG within the EU. This question is posed in the context of increased Russian LNG imports by some EU countries, despite efforts to reduce energy dependence on Russia. The question resolves as NO if no such new sanctions are imposed by the specified date.

The closing value must be reported by at least two reputable financial news sources. If the index does not close above 35,000 points by the specified date, or if there are significant changes to the structure or calculation of the Nikkei 225 index that make this comparison invalid, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will a prominent Vietnamese business tycoon's 21-year sentence be reduced by August 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if a prominent Vietnamese business tycoon, convicted of defrauding stockholders of nearly $150 million, has his 21-year sentence officially reduced by August 31, 2024. The reduction must be confirmed through official court documents or statements reported by at least two reputable news sources. If the sentence remains unchanged or is increased, the question resolves as NO. The tycoon in question was found guilty of falsely inflating the value of his company.

title: Will a prominent Vietnamese business tycoon's conviction for major financial fraud be overturned by August 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if, by August 31, 2024, a Vietnamese court officially overturns the conviction of a prominent business tycoon who was found guilty of defrauding stockholders of nearly $150 million. The overturn must be confirmed through official court documents or statements reported by at least two reputable international news sources. If the conviction remains upheld or if no official overturn is announced by the resolution date, the question resolves as NO. For clarity, an appeal process that is ongoing but not concluded by the resolution date does not count as an overturn.

title: Will a European country withdraw from an Olympic swimming event due to water quality concerns by August 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if, by August 31, 2024, any European country officially withdraws its team or individual athletes from an Olympic swimming event citing concerns about water quality in the venue. The withdrawal must be confirmed by the country's Olympic committee or relevant sports authority and reported by at least two reputable international news sources. The concern must be specifically related to the quality of water in which the event is to take place, such as a river, lake, or sea. Pool-based events are not included in this resolution. If no such withdrawal occurs or is not explicitly linked to water quality concerns, the question resolves as NO.

body: This question will resolve as YES if a Marvel superhero movie released in 2024 grosses over $700 million worldwide by August 31, 2024. The gross revenue should be reported by at least two reputable sources such as Box Office Mojo, The Hollywood Reporter, or Variety. The movie must be officially associated with Marvel Studios or its parent company Disney, and feature Marvel comic book characters as central protagonists. This question does not refer to any specific Marvel movie title or cast members.

The earnings should not be adjusted for inflation. title: Will a prominent rock vocalist perform live in concert by August 2024 despite reported vocal cord damage?
body: This question resolves as YES if a well-known rock vocalist, who has been reported to have suffered permanent vocal cord damage, performs live in a concert by August 31, 2024. The performance must be officially announced and reported by at least two reputable news sources. To qualify, the vocalist must have been a lead singer in a globally recognized rock band for at least two decades. The concert must be a full-length performance (at least 60 minutes) and not just a brief appearance or cameo. If no such performance occurs under these conditions, the question resolves as NO.
